revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7300 |revision=DST |asin=B01HB56E5G |fcc_date=08/19/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H270 |manuf_rev=T00 |type=wireless router, Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=PY315200307 |ic_id=4054A-15200307 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1.3 |pwr_conn=AC direct |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM60335 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54612E |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;3; |flags=HomePlug AV2, SISO |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=http://www.routerlogin.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Nighthawk DST Router & DST Adapter}}
''Dead Spot Terminator - 802.11ac Dual Band Gigabit'' :{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7300DST.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7300DST}} "PLC_MOUDULE_NETGEAR_60335" is silkscreened on the PLC PCB in the FCC photos. :The device is presumed to use a [[Broadcom]] BCM60335 as the HomePlug controller. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32941-netgear-r7300dst-nighthawk-dst-router-dst-adapter-reviewed ''NETGEAR R7300DST Nighthawk DST Router & DST Adapter'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"U12H270T00", "801466", "REV.1 GP" is silkscreened on the board ([[Foxconn]]) :The device is using BCM4709A + 2x BCM4360 + BCM54612E (SW GbE PLC), :3x SE2623L PAMs for the 2.4GHz radio, 3x SE5003L1 PAMs for the 5GHz radio *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32229-netgear-joins-the-ac1900-club ''NETGEAR Joins The AC1900 Club'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===See also=== * [[Netgear R7000]] - Similar router-only model * [[Netgear DST6501]] - Add-on powerline access point __NOTOC__
